description:
It’s finally Halloween, and things are about to get sPoOoOoOoKy at all the local cafés. From candy to costumes, it’s bound to be a scary-fun time for all!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kon`ya wa Yuurei to Datte Odoriakaseru Halloween Night!
We Shall Dance with Ghosts Until Dawn on This Halloween Night!
今夜は幽霊とだって踊り明かせるHalloween Night!
